020import net.tnemc.bukkit.BukkitConfig;
021import net.tnemc.bukkit.BukkitItemCalculations;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
023import net.tnemc.bukkit.depend.faction.FactionHandler;
024import net.tnemc.bukkit.depend.towny.TownyHandler;
025import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
026import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.TNECallbacks;
027import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.currency.CurrencyLoadCallback;
028import net.tnemc.menu.paper.PaperMenuHandler;
029import net.tnemc.paper.command.AdminCommand;
030import net.tnemc.paper.command.CurrencyMoneyCommand;
031import net.tnemc.paper.command.ModuleCommand;
032import net.tnemc.paper.command.MoneyCommand;
033import net.tnemc.paper.command.ShortCommands;
034import net.tnemc.paper.command.TransactionCommand;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackManager;
037import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
038import org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin;
039import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.BukkitLamp;
040import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
041import revxrsal.commands.command.ExecutableCommand;
042import revxrsal.commands.orphan.Orphans;
043
044/**
045 * PaperCore
046 *
047 * @author creatorfromhell
048 * @since 0.1.2.0
049 */
050public class PaperCore extends TNECore {
051
052  protected final JavaPlugin plugin;
053
054  private BukkitConfig bukkitConfig;
055
056  public PaperCore(final JavaPlugin plugin) {
057
058    this.plugin = plugin;
059  }
060
061  public static PaperCore instance() {
062
063    return (PaperCore)TNECore.instance();
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public void registerMenuHandler() {
068
069    this.menuHandler = new PaperMenuHandler(plugin, true);
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public void registerCommandHandler() {
074
075    command = BukkitLamp.builder(plugin).accept(registerParameters()).build();
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public String commandHelpWriter(final ExecutableCommand executableCommand, final CommandActor commandActor) {
080
081    return "";
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public void registerConfigs() {
086
087    super.registerConfigs();
088
089    this.bukkitConfig = new BukkitConfig();
090    if(!this.bukkitConfig.load()) {
091      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to load bukkit configuration!");
092    }
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public void registerCommands() {
097
098    super.registerCommands();
099
100    //Register our commands
101    command.register(new AdminCommand());
102    command.register(new ShortCommands());
103    command.register(new ModuleCommand());
104    command.register(new MoneyCommand());
105    command.register(new TransactionCommand());
106
107    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
108
109      command.register(Orphans.path(currency.getIdentifier().toLowerCase()).handler(new CurrencyMoneyCommand(currency)));
110    }
111  }
112
113  @Override
114  public void registerCallbacks(final CallbackManager callbackManager) {
115
116    super.registerCallbacks(callbackManager);
117
118    callbackManager.addConsumer(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_TYPES.id(), (callback->{
119
120      if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("Towny") != null) {
121
122        PluginCore.log().debug("Adding Towny Account Types");
123        TownyHandler.addTypes();
124      }
125
126      if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("Factions") != null) {
127
128        PluginCore.log().debug("Adding Factions Account Types");
129        FactionHandler.addTypes();
130      }
131      return false;
132    }));
133  }
134
135  @Override
136  public BukkitItemCalculations itemCalculations() {
137
138    return new BukkitItemCalculations();
139  }
140
141  public JavaPlugin getPlugin() {
142
143    return plugin;
144  }
145}
